MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock, affecting properties in Hearth Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:02pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11pm on 5th January 2021.
